abstract: Colorado Rockies shortstop Jose Reyes is placed on paid leave for duration of criminal proceedings stemming from domestic violence charge.
lead_paragraph: Reyes, a Rockies shortstop, was placed on paid leave under Major League Baseball’s new domestic violence policy pending completion of criminal proceedings.

headline.main: Jose Reyes on Leave While Facing Charge
headline.print_headline: Reyes on Leave While Facing Charge

snippet: Reyes, a Rockies shortstop, was placed on paid leave under Major League Baseball’s new domestic violence policy pending completion of criminal proceedings.
